content:
ATTACK: Adversarial Prompts
TECHNIQUE: Adversarial optimization
SEVERITY: high
DESCRIPTION: Carefully crafted prompts to evade detection

PATTERN:
Optimized adversarial inputs

DETECTION SIGNALS:
adversarial, optimized, evade

MITIGATION:
Adversarial detection, robustness testing

EXAMPLES:
- Optimized prompts that bypass filters
- Adversarial examples from research papers
